text: [Ej pajomʙar] Bad-in son turo ʙajni ummate firistodem, ki peş az onho ummathoe omada [va rafta] ʙudand, to on ci ʙar tu vahj kardaem, ʙar onon ʙixonī va hol on ki onon ʙa [Parvardigori] rahmon kufr mevarzand. Bigū: «Ū Parvardigori man ast [va] ma'ʙude [ʙarhaq] çuz Ū nest. Bar Ū tavakkal kardam va ʙozgaştam ʙa sūji Ūst»
